meanings.sent2: It is sad when a pet predeceases its owner.
meanings.sent3: The race to the finish line was won by the tortoise, who predeceases the hare!
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the pawn predeceases the queen.
meanings.sent5: The fading light of dusk predeceases the darkness of night.

meanings.sent1: The sunrise predeceases the start of the day.
meanings.sent2: The announcement of the winner predeceases the award ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of freshly baked cookies predeceases their delicious taste.
meanings.sent4: The chirping of birds predeceases the break of dawn.
meanings.sent5: The first drop of rain predeceases the storm.
